thread.title: BRIEF-Dallah Healthcare Awards Contract For Expansion of Dallah Hospital Al-Nakheel

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Dallah Healthcare Awards Contract For Expansion of Dallah Hospital Al-Nakheel

organizations.name: brief-dallah healthcare awards contract for expansion of dallah hospital al-nakheel

text:
Jan 29 (Reuters) - DALLAH HEALTHCARE CO:
* SIGNS 130.7 MILLION RIYALS CONTRACT FOR MECHANICAL, ELECTRICAL WORK AND PLUMBING FOR WEST EXPANSION OF DALLAH HOSPITAL - AL-NAKHEEL‍​
* PROJECT WILL BE FINANCED THROUGH OPERATIONS OF COMPANY AND LONG TERM BANK FACILITIES RELATED TO WEST EXPANSION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
